title: President Donald J. Trump Continues to Advance American Leadership in Space – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
December 9, 2020
The essence of the American character is to explore new horizons and to tame new frontiers.
						President Donald J. Trump					A DYNAMIC NATIONAL SPACE POLICY: President Donald J. Trump issued a new National Space Policy to outline and secure enduring goals for our country’s space activities.
